sentence: Settlement funds will be disbursed to the state and its subdivisions through the One Arizona Plan over an 18-year period to aid in treatment, preventative measures and for education, Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich said in a press release.
author: KTAR.COM
title: Weekend wrap-up: Here are the biggest Arizona stories from Feb. 25-27

sentence: The Arizona Supreme Court has given Attorney General Mark Brnovich another chance to argue some of his claims against a real estate deal between Arizona State University and Omni for a hotel and conference center in downtown Tempe.
author: Alison Steinbach
title: Arizona Supreme Court allows Brnovich to continue to challenge parts of ASU-Omni hotel deal

sentence: PHOENIX – The Arizona Supreme Court on Tuesday revived a lawsuit filed by Attorney General Mark Brnovich against the board that oversees the state's three public universities over a hotel development agreement, giving him the right to try to prove the deal doesn't benefit taxpayers.
title: AZ high court revives AG suit against ASU hotel

sentence: TUCSON, Ariz. (KGUN) — Attorney General (AG) Mark Brnovich has announced the first execution warrant issued across Arizona in eight years.
author: Caleb J. Fernández
title: AG Brnovich announces first execution warrant issued across Arizona in eight years

sentence: PHOENIX (AP) — The Arizona Supreme Court on Tuesday revived a lawsuit filed by Attorney General Mark Brnovich against the board that oversees the state's three public universities over a hotel development agreement, giving him the right to try to prove the deal doesn't benefit taxpayers.
author: BOB CHRISTIE
title: Arizona high court revives AG's suit against ASU hotel plan
